title: Chromas Not Available For BE
body:
In the shop, it says that all chromas are available for blue essence in the featured tab. However, when you go to the skin tab and to chromas, the following are unavailable via blue essence:

Battlecast Urgot
Dragonblade Talon
Dreadnova Gangplank
Eternal Sword Yi
Sacred Sword Janna
Prime Time Draven
Arcade Corki
Battleboss Blitzcrank
Omega Squad Fizz
Omega Squad Teemo
Omega Squad Tritana
Omega Squad Twitch
Omega Squad Viegar
Pool Party Fiora
Pool Party Lulu
Pool Party Graves

Are these chromas going to be made available through blue essence?

replies.body: Hey Can anyone tell me why the headmistress Fiora's are missing ? or am just stupid. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Hey there, these chromas are selected specifically for the current shop.  It's not the same as the previous IP Chroma sales, so it may not have everything or the same expectations of previous sales.

I'm afraid I don't understand. Does this mean that when it says all chromas in the shop will be available for blue essence that not all chromas in the shop will be available for blue essence? You have confused me.

I may have confused me too!  Can you toss me the url so I can check out the details?  I checked with our billing team, and my understanding is that the chromas currently are selected and not all of them.  Sorry for the confusion, but do let me know!

I looked at the laucher and it said all chromas, but after you asked for a link I went to the faq, and it says that it is only for chromas that have been out for at least 6 months and I guess these, including the ones I wanted from that list, were added less than 6 months ago.

2,000 BE - Chromas (includes all chromas that have been available for at least six months)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908-Preseason-Update-FAQ

Hey-yo. The Essence Emporium has all chromas that are 6 months old or more available (similar to how we did past IP Chroma sales). Legacy chromas like Headmistress Fiora Chromas are also not included. [https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115014872088) The text in the featured tab does look confusing tho. The featured tab is meant o say that those chromas "purchasable with blue essence" can be found in the skin > Chromas tab. We were looking to help explain where to look for the Chromas, but we unfortunately confused some of ya. We're working on updating it to be more clear.
